topic: Topic: Recognition of courses from abroad
question:
Hello,

Thank you for the information. I hope you are well.

At the time of the screenshot, an exam for three credits had not yet been accepted as "valid". 69 credits are now recorded in TUMonline. I do not plan to take a leave of absence to write the Advanced Topics of SE exam in the winter semester 2024/25. I have the following questions regarding the recognition of courses from abroad:

1. Is a successful pre-check (recognition possible) and a successful check of equivalence with a TUM module (1:1 credit) sufficient to ensure successful and smooth recognition?

2. Can you confirm that if I submit the recognition application in January or February (as soon as I have all the documents such as certificates together), the credits will count for the winter semester 2024/25?

Thank you again for your support - very valuable for my current plans.

Best regards."
answer:
Good day,

Please contact my colleagues from the recognition team regarding the two questions on recognition.

Best regards.
